name: LoungeflyDisney Raya en de Laatste Draak: Sisu Portemonnee - Merchoid Nederland
description: Once upon a time, in a world divided by fear and mistrust, a brave warrior named Raya set out on a quest to find the last dragon and bring peace to her people. And now, you too can channel her courage and determination with the Sisu Cosplay Zip Around Wallet, inspired by Disney's Raya and the Last Dragon. With a charmingly whimsical design featuring Sisu, the plucky dragon who joins Raya on her epic journey, this wallet will bring a pop of color and flair to any outfit. Sisu's friendly face graces the front of the wallet, while her colorful scale pattern adorns the back. And with its cool blend of blue and purple hues, this wallet is practically begging to be shown off to all your fashion-forward friends. But the Sisu Cosplay Zip Around Wallet isn't just fun and stylish - it's also unbelievably functional. With four slots for cards, a transparent ID window, and a side pocket for your cash, this wallet has everything you need to stay organized on the go. And thanks to its sleek, zip-around design, you can carry it with you anywhere, without worrying about losing any of your precious belongings. So whether you're embarking on your own epic quest, or just need a little extra dash of magic in your everyday life, the Sisu Cosplay Zip Around Wallet is your perfect accessory. Embrace your inner Raya, and let the power of the last dragon guide you towards your destiny. - 4 card slots to keep your life organized- Clear ID window so you can impress anyone who needs to see your ID - Side pocket so you can get the action items you need immediately - Made of sleek and stylish vegan leather (polyurethane)- Zipper pocket for an added layer of security - Officially licensed Disney product - 6"W x 4"H (please note: width is measured across the bottom of the wallet)Product DetailsProduct type: WalletLicense: Disney Raya and the Last DragonManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 150 gram (5 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDWA1865GTIN: 671803398016
